name: Untilted Amazons Game - Work in Progress
name_original: Untilted Amazons Game - Work in Progress
description:
The basics of the game is to Move a Piece and Shoot an Arrow on the ground, both in the pattern of a Chess Queen, blocking movement. All the pieces are immortal.

Repeated until one player can't move any of their pieces.  

The last player to make a valid play (move and shoot) is the winner. Each player has a different number of pieces, depending on board size.

As my first game, I tried to bring the classic rules of Walter Zamkauskas' "Game of Amazons" and implemented some different types of movement and shooting pattern for different tribes of amazons.

All the assets used are free assets from the Unity Store.
